headline: Phillips 66 to acquire EPIC NGL assets for $2.2bn
summary: The EPIC NGL assets include two fractionators, 350 miles of pipelines and an 885-mile natural gas liquids (NGL) pipeline with a capacity of 175,000 barrels per day (bpd).

headline: Phillips 66 to Buy EPIC NGL for $2.2 Billion
summary: Phillips 66 will buy EPIC NGL for $2.2 billion to help the Houston oil refiner grow its Permian midstream business.

raw.headline: Phillips 66 to Buy EPIC NGL for $2.2 Billion
raw.summary: Phillips 66 will buy EPIC NGL for $2.2 billion to help the Houston oil refiner grow its Permian midstream business.

headline: Phillips 66 to buy EPIC NGL for $2.2 billion in bid to boost Permian presence
summary: Phillips 66 would acquire EPIC Y-Grade GP and EPIC Y-Grade, and its various subsidiaries under the deal, which is expected to be immediately accretive to earnings per share, it said in its statement.  "This transaction optimizes our Permian NGL value chain, allows Phillips 66 to provide producers with comprehensive flow assurance and is expected to deliver attractive returns in excess of our hurdle rates," said Phillips 66 CEO Mark Lashier.  While EPIC is in the process of increasing its pipeline capacity to 225 million barrels per day (mbd) and has sanctioned a second expansion to increase capacity to 350 mbd, Phillips 66 said it does not expect to increase its 2025 capital program in connection with the expansion.

"This transaction optimizes our Permian NGL value chain, allows Phillips 66 to provide producers with comprehensive flow assurance and is expected to deliver attractive returns in excess of our hurdle rates," said Phillips 66 CEO Mark Lashier.  While EPIC is in the process of increasing its pipeline capacity to 225 million barrels per day (mbd) and has sanctioned a second expansion to increase capacity to 350 mbd, Phillips 66 said it does not expect to increase its 2025 capital program in connection with the expansion.
